snippet.title: Early Apple documents posted to Computer History Museum site
snippet.description: ...A couple of documents giving insight into Apple's early days are making the rounds today thanks to The Computer History Museum (CHM) in Mountain View, California. Apple's Preliminary Macintosh Business Plan and Preliminary Confidential Offering Memorandum have both been posted to the museum's website, donated by Dan Kottke and Mike Markkula.According to the CHM, the Preliminary Mac...
